item.title: Litter everywhere, 23rd July
item.description:
Non residents park here to eat kebabs and then throw their rubbish out the car windows before they drive off. Horrible behaviour

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Walford Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Overhanging Trees/Bushes - Obstructing Pavement, 23rd July

item.title: Fly tipping, 23rd July
item.description:
Rubbish left over from building work. There was work going on in one of the houses on Plumstead Common Road and were using the passage way to access the back of the house. When the work was completed, the carpet remnants and the builders bags were left behind. (NB, happy to provide the house number as needed)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tuam Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gate stiff, 23rd July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rangefield Road, Sundridge, London

item.title: Litter everywhere, 23rd July
item.description:
Number 1 and 2 children keep sitting here eating and drinking and just leaving all there rubbish in this little square bit itâ€™s not nice seeing loads of litter here makes the place look dirty

item.title: Outside 39 Denning Road, 23rd July
item.description:
Big Branch damaged by lorry and overhanging on pavement causing major hazard to residents and passers by and blocking the entrance to 39 Denning Road. Very likely to fall. Unable to take photos because of arm injury. Have tried to report the issue of low overhanging branches many times, please investigate asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Denning Road, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 23rd July
item.description:
A mattress spring box has been left in the alley. Because this item was left nearly a month ago, it is inviting the low-lifes that hang out in the alley to use it as a personal rubbish bin, e.g. fried chicken and chips boxes, used feminine sanitary pads. Hopefully it paints a picture.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tuam Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: HGV diversion, 23rd July
item.description:
HGVs are using the diversion route for JCT 29-28 M25 closure not realising there is a low bridge on the the diversion route. No signs anywhere to suggest there is a low bridge to drivers and itâ€™s causing mayhem on the route and blocking it up making drivers turn around and find an alternative
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken Recycling Bin, 23rd July
item.description:
Recycling bin and rubbish bin with broken lids. Recycling bin was replaced after the refuse workers arranged for replacement to be delivered but the old broken bin has not been picked up. The refuse bin has a broken lid also.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Revelon Road, Brockley, London
